titleStmt.title: Thomas C. Donn to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1686

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Washington City September 20 1863
To the Governor of the State of Kentucky
Sir

I Respectfully make application for the appointment as a commissioner of Your State to take the acknowledgements of Deeds affidavits, Depositions and other instruments of Writing in the District of Colombia to be used and Recorded in your State. I have an office in the Center of Business in this City and have been for some time a Commissioner for a number of the States of the Union and have frequent calls from Soldiers and others to take acknowledgements for your State, Which would be a great Convenience.
I can produce Certificate of public offices here of my capability and of my Loyalty

Respectfully
Thomas C. Donn
Commissioner of Deeds.
Affidavits, Depositions
The various States
in District of Colombia
Thos C. Donn
Application
Comr of Deeds
Washington
D. C.
Recd. 14 9th Oct/639th Oct/63
comd 20th Oct/63
